title: Pre-training strategies for optimizing cognitive load in problem-solving

context.additional_context: A course optimized for mobile environments, utilizing concept maps and glossaries to enable self-directed learning outside of work hours for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more mathematical problem-solving procedures through concept map analysis.
Learners can present definitions and application examples of 20 or more core mathematical terms by referencing a glossary.
Learners can submit self-assessments demonstrating a reduction of 30% or more in cognitive load during complex problem-solving after pre-training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
